1.title: iSense
1.subtitle: Decoding vision, delivering insight
1.description: iSense is an AI-powered image analysis platform that integrates computer vision and natural language processing. Users can upload images and ask questions in natural language to receive intelligent, contextual answers, powered by the LLaMA 4 Scout model on Groq's high-performance infrastructure.
keyFeatures: Image understanding using Groq's LLaMA 4 Scout model
Real-time image upload and preview with support for multiple formats
Fully responsive and animated UI built with Tailwind CSS
Planned support for persistent chat history

2.title: Tazkz
2.subtitle: Not the regular task manager
2.description: Tazkz is a modern task and note-taking application that reimagines productivity by combining tasks and thoughts in a single, unified interface. Built with Next.js 15 and Tailwind CSS, it provides a fast, clean, and intuitive experience to help users plan, manage, and track their day effectively.
keyFeatures: Smart task management with parent-child hierarchy, progress tracking, and priority-based sorting
Real-time progress visualization using interactive sliders and indicators
Secure authentication with protected routes powered by Clerk
Responsive and animated UI built using shadcn/ui
Robust full-stack setup using Next.js 15 (App Router), Supabase (PostgreSQL), and TypeScript
